long_description: A padded trunk bag for everyday rides, the Deuter Rack Top Pack keeps things neatly organized and features tough, weather-resistant fabric to protect its contents. Coated ripstop nylon is lightweight, tough and weather resistant; included rain cover keeps things dry in seriously wet weather. Deuter Rack Top Pack attaches with rip-and-stick straps and includes an attachment loop for a rear bike light (light not included). Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. Zip opening; internal pockets; 2 side pockets; bottle holder; shoulder strap.
short_description: A padded trunk bag for everyday rides, the Deuter Rack Top Pack keeps things neatly organized and features tough, weather-resistant fabric to protect its contents.
